price: Они рекоше: „Нама је свеједно саветовао ти или не саветовао,
arabic: قَالُواْ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيۡنَآ أَوَعَظۡتَ أَمۡ لَمۡ تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡوَٰعِظِينَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū sawāon ʿalaynā awaʿaẓta am lam takun mina al-wāʿiẓīna
